name: Dungeon Warrior (sanmaniro)
description:
Dungeon Warrior is an exciting adventure game that puts the player in control of a mighty warrior as they journey through a treacherous dungeon filled with monsters and traps. The player moves their character using the arrow keys on their keyboard, and engages in combat with the monsters by pressing the spacebar.

The game is divided into several rooms, each containing different challenges and rewards. Some rooms are filled with coins that the player can collect to increase their score, while others are infested with dangerous monsters that the player must defeat to progress.

As the warrior battles their way through the dungeon, they must also manage their health. The warrior has a certain number of hearts that represent their health, and these hearts will decrease when the monster strikes. The player must be strategic in their attacks and defenses to avoid taking too much damage and losing all their hearts.

Dungeon Warrior is a fast-paced and engaging game that offers hours of entertainment. With its simple controls and challenging gameplay, it is a game that is easy to pick up but hard to put down. Whether you are a seasoned gamer or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, Dungeon Warrior is a game that is sure to deliver.
